column5: I can't find the pic of the Ofner holding the baby beaver. Can anyone help????   Thanx in advance, Daniel OCH
oh yeah, we Canadians are always looking for ways to help out beavers I personally have not grabbed too many in the water
Opps I missed this post!! That's funny. Awesome tho.
I never grabbed a beaver that looked like that!
Whenever I get close to holdin' a beaver..it slaps me!
That thing might have made some pretty good bait! > > > > > >ya never know what yer gonna catch on a little Beaver!!!
